table_description: Stargazers are users who have starred the repository.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the stargazer.

columns.name: starred_at
columns.description: Time when the stargazer was created.

columns.name: user_login
columns.description: The login name of the user who starred the repository.

columns.name: user_detail
columns.description: Details of the user who starred the repository.
